description:
Zvezda has run out of udo for Roboko, so Asuta heads underneath the base to obtain more. Shortly after his arrival, all of the udo wither and die, and the Udo Reactor has lost its source of energy, meaning that there isn`t enough power for any of the Zvezda members to transform.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`udo est dans la terre froide
Udo wa Tsumetai Tsuchi no Naka ni
